content: प्रतिविधा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To counteract, correct, repair, retaliate, remedy, take steps against; अर्थवाद एषः . दोषं तु मे कंचित्कथय येन स प्रतिविधीयेत <ls>U. 1</ls>; क्षिप्रपेव कस्मान्न प्रतिविहितमार्येण Mu {3} {@--2@} To dispose, arrange, prepare. {@--3@} To despatch, send. {@--4@} To doom, condemn; <ls>U. 4.</ls>
